评论概述: Pleasantly surprised by how much I like them!
评论详情: I’ve bought inexpensive sunglasses off Amazon once or twice before, and they were roughly what I expected for $15 sunglasses — not the sturdiest, but reasonably good looking and kept the sun out of my eyes. These are noticeably better than that. I actually really like them, both the looks and the sturdiness. I bought them in the lightest brown color, which is maybe not the most on-trend but works best with my pale skin and hair. They are darker than tan but later than full-on brown. And kind of translucent, like the lighter-colored parts of a tortoiseshell item…. They feel like a bargain for the price. Recommended!
